/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the sides of the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network of connections that power the city's life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting light and shadows that play across the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up towards the buildings and the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape.
